markdownRemark.html:
PROP. XXIV. The more we understand particular things, the more do we understand God.

Proof.—This is evident from I. xxv. Coroll.

V-XXV. The highest endeavour of the mind, and the highest virtue is to understand things by the third kind of knowledge.
